Package de.oth.blocklib.gui.elements.base

Class UIItem

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.gui.elements.base.UIItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
DoubleBuffer
Direct Known Subclasses:
CraftingDisplay, Crosshair, DebugOverlay, GUI, InventoryHUD, InventoryManager, RespawnMenu, UIBaseButton, UIColorRect, UIContainer, UIInventory, UILabel, UILineEdit, UINotification, UITextBox, UITexture
public class UIItem
extends java.lang.Object
implements DoubleBuffer
Base class for UI items. Structured in a tree. InputEvents get passed down until someone handles it and marks it as handled.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  UIItem.FocusMode
    determines how focus events are handled.
    static class  UIItem.LayoutPreset
    Presets that help with positioning elements.
    static class  UIItem.MouseFilter
    determines how mouse events are handled and passed further down.
    static class  UIItem.SizeFlags
    Flags for a parent container to handle the position/size for child ui items setHorizontalExpand() and respective unset setHorizontalFill() and respective unset setSizeFlagHorizontal(SizeFlags, boolean) ... also available for 'Vertical' instead of 'Horizontal'
